SELECT RN,NUM,TITLE,CONTENT,TERRAIN,POINT,APPROVAL,REGIST_DATE,START_QR,UPDATE_DATE,START_ADDRESS,END_ADDRESS,NICKNAME,STARTTIME,ENDTIME,COURSE,DISTANCE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, P.NUM AS NUM,P.TITLE AS TITLE,P.CONTENT AS CONTENT,P.TERRAIN AS TERRAIN ,P.POINT AS POINT,P.APPROVAL AS APPROVAL ,P.REGIST_DATE AS REGIST_DATE ,P.START_QR AS START_QR,P.UPDATE_DATE AS UPDATE_DATE ,P.COMPANY_NUM AS C ,P.START_ADDRESS AS START_ADDRESS, P.END_ADDRESS AS END_ADDRESS, C.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME,P.STARTTIME AS STARTTIME ,P.ENDTIME AS ENDTIME,P.COURSE AS COURSE,P.DISTANCE AS DISTANCE FROM TBL_PROJECT P ,TBL_COMPANY C WHERE P.COMPANY_NUM = C.NUM
AND ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}
) WHERE RN > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND NUM LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND START_ADDRESS LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND TERRAIN = '1'
AND TERRAIN = '2'
AND TERRAIN = '3'
AND TERRAIN = '4'
AND (REGIST_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate})
AND (STARTTIME BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate})
AND (ENDTIME BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate})
AND (UPDATE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate})
ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC
